_header: Keep well thy counsel as treasure in chest
_description: Keep silence: friends may become foes — six lines (abcbca)

TCD661.Transcription:
Kepe well thy cowncell as tresor in chesteTell neuer all that thy
                    hart lustefor when thy frynde ys thy foothat aye was thy
                    trusteThen shall thy foo knowall that thy frynde wyste
